name: pettranslator
0:
”Alexa, ask pet translator what did my cat just say”
”what did my dog just say”
”what is my pet saying”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pet translator
des: Your pets say a lot of things, and now, Alexa can translate them for you immediately using the latest advances in pet tech. You say a lot of things to your pets, now hear what your pets are saying to you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
